content: 1 ixanicreations presents lucrecia scarf pattern enjoy this pattern from ixanicreations i m thrilled to be a part of your crochet experience this pattern is designed for advanced beginners and up as this is a made to measure pattern please read the entire pattern before starting 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this pattern finished projects may be sold but please give pattern credit ixanicreations on instagram 2 skill level advanced beginner and up supplies you can use any yarn you like my version i used approximately 240 yards of knitpal off- the-yak a medium 4 weight yarn gauge isn t necessary but use whatever hook the yarn recommends the hook i used for my scarf was a 5mm hook scissors large needle optional stitch marker us terms and abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet =single_crochet slp st = slip_stitch ws = wrong side rs = right side invisible seam - insert your hook into the first stitch of the round from the wrong side to the right side pull the loop through the stitch and rotate your hook round to position cross double_crochet - skip st double_crochet double_crochet back into skipped st v st- double_crochet ch1 double_crochet same stitch 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this pattern finished projects may be sold but please give pattern credit ixanicreations on instagram 3 notes chain 2 doesn t count as stitch scarf is worked in the round no sewing starting with the bottom and build up to desired height making the scarf long enough to wrap around twice chain even amount of sts slp st to beginning chain to create a circle another method is foundation single_crochet and slp st to the beginning chain to create a circle and skipping to round 2 *note make sure to not twist the chain when closing the circle 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this pattern finished projects may be sold but please give pattern credit ixanicreations on instagram 4 instructions round 1 rs chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in each st turn work slp st bor by using invisible seam method round 2 ws ch2 double_crochet in each st around turn work slp st bor by using invisible seam method round 3 rs chain 2 cross double_crochet into each st turn work slp st bor using invisible seam method 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this pattern finished projects may be sold but please give pattern credit ixanicreations on instagram 5 round 4 ws chain 2 double_crochet in each st around turn work slp st bor using invisible seam method round 5 rs ch2 **v st in first st skip a st** repeat from * until end turn work slp st bor using invisible seam method round 6 ws ch2 double_crochet each st around skipping chain 1 from previous round turn work slp st bor using invisible seam method round 7 rs repeat round 3 2024 ixanicreations please do not share or sell this
